title: CH3OH decomp - compare pressure after reaction

content.prompt: A sample of CH3OH(g) is placed in the previously evacuated vessel with a pressure of P1 at 600 K. What is the final pressure in the vessel after the reaction is complete and the contents of the vessel are returned to 600 K?

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
